CheckTitle: Check if ELB listeners are using certificates from ACM.
Description: Checks if Classic Load Balancers have listeners that are configured to use certificates from AWS Certificate Manager (ACM). The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if at least 1 Classic Load Balancer has at least 1 listener that is configured without a certificate from ACM or is configured with a certificate different from an ACM certificate.
Risk: Listeners without ACM certificates may be using insecure or untrusted certificates.

Recommendation.Text: Ensure that your Classic Load Balancer listeners are configured to use certificates from ACM.
